news.title: Gardaí search army barracks as part of child sexual exploitation investigation
news.summary: Gardaí have carried out a search of a military barracks as part of a child sexual exploitation investigation.

news.title: Israel approves Netanyahu’s plan to take control of Gaza City
news.summary: Israel's political-security cabinet approved a plan early on Friday to take control of Gaza City, as the country expands its military operations despite intensifying criticism at home and abroad over the devastating almost two-year-old war.

news.title: Full post-mortem report on Irish woman found dead on New York yacht could take ‘months’, family told
news.summary: A post-mortem examination and toxicology report on the remains of an Irish woman who died in the Hamptons in New York, could take several months, her family have been told.

news.title: Kevin ‘Boxer’ Moran hits back at ‘hypocrisy’ accusations as he withdraws name from legal action against asylum centre
news.summary: Independent minister Kevin ‘Boxer’ Moran has strongly hit back at accusations that he is a hypocrite after withdrawing his name from a legal action against the State over an asylum accommodation centre in the midlands.

news.title: ‘So who is ripping us off?’ – dismay as watchdog finds no evidence of supermarket price gouging despite costs surging
news.summary: Findings of an official report that there is no price gouging by supermarkets have been greeted with dismay.

news.title: ‘It’s a nightmare for them’ – Irish ex-rugby player Shane Leahy supporting children with disabilities on Ukrainian front line
news.summary: Located at the very front line of the war in Ukraine, the port city of ­Kherson appears all but abandoned.

news.title: Andy Moran the favourite to take Mayo reins from Kevin McStay
news.summary: Andy Moran’s prospects of becoming the next Mayo manager have hardened as the county board move closer to a call on Kevin McStay’s replacement.

news.title: ‘We have come out stronger than ever’: Why Dee Devlin stands by her man Conor McGregor
news.summary: On her ribcage, just below the line of her bikini, is a tattoo of her fiancé’s name – Conor McGregor. Dee Devlin acrobatically balances herself backwards between a couch and a table and pouts into the clear blue void above.

news.title: Modern Morals: My 15-year-old niece asked me to bring her to the doctor to get the pill – do I need to tell her parents?
The Irish Independent’s View: Doubting consumers need reassuring on soaring cost of food
news.summary: Consumers may well feel they are living in a parallel universe when it comes to comparing their views on supermarket prices with those who own those businesses. Altered states of reality do appear to exist when it comes to how prices are perceived.
